content: In what type of celestial body did Captain Picard and his crew live on in Star Trek: The Next Generation?

Captain Picard and his crew lived on the starship USS Enterprise, which was a Galaxy-class starship in the fictional universe of Star Trek: The Next Generation. The Enterprise was not a celestial body but rather a large, advanced spacecraft designed for exploration and diplomatic missions. It was equipped with various facilities, including living quarters, recreational areas, scientific labs, and defensive systems, to support the crew during their long voyages through space.
